import React from 'react'; const ProductBlock = ({title, price, imageUrl, measure}) => { const count = [1, 2, ] const [productCount, setProductCount] = React.useState(0) const [activeCount, setActiveCount] = React.useState(1) const addToCart = () => setProductCount(productCount + 1) return (

{title}

  • {measure}
  • 1
  • 2
{price} €
); }; export default ProductBlock;
